com.software.reuze

Interface vc_i_Distance

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    vc_DistanceHSV, vc_DistanceRGB

    public interface vc_i_Distance
    A proxy interface to support the sorting of colors in different color spaces. Used by vc_ColorList#sortByDistance(DistanceProxy, boolean).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float distanceBetween(z_Colors a, z_Colors b)
      Computes the distance between 2 colors.
